news.title: Technovanza is Coming
news.content:
Mark the date,
Coz we are never late,
Set your arrivals,
But not your departures,
Technovanza'16 is finally here.

news.title: Chess
news.content:
Chess is the triumph of the intellect and genius over lack of imagination, the triumph of personality over materialism.

news.title: Wireless Communication
news.content:
'J.C. Bose has transmitted signals to a distance of nearly a mile and herein lies the first and obvious and exceedingly valuable application of this new theoretical marvel.'

news.title: Atom
news.content:
The beauty of a living thing is not the atoms that go into it, but the way those atoms are put together.

news.title: Happy Father's Day!!
news.content:
A Son's first Hero.A Daughter's first love.
The Guiding Light in the Journey called Life.
He silently works for your Joy.
Go out and make him feel special today, as for you, he might be a part of your world,
But to him,
YOU are his world!
